name: Up on the Rooftop
description:
Santa's elves have revolted! Christmas is falling apart, but reindeer are on the case! Knock sense into the elves and ensure Santa can make his delivery on time! Avoid Bears! Make deliveries along the way! They must save Christmas; they will save Christmas!

Up on the Rooftop is an arcade-style game inspired by Balloon Fight and Joust. Play alone or with a friend in couch co-op! Reach the top of the local leaderboards, and challenge your friends to beat your top score! Enjoy the holiday inspired soundtrack on 20 different stages! And even find secrets(?)

This Steam version of Up on the Rooftop has features not found in the initial release of the game.

This game featured as an Escape Room puzzle December 2019 in Edson, Alberta.

Soundtrack composed by FancifulEight.


- LATEST UPDATE -

Local Multiplayer Versus has been added to the game. Have fun in with up to four players as you play some versus Reindeer Games!
